example:
() => (
  <Stack direction="column">
    <Stack direction="column">
      <Heading type="title3" as="h3">
        Small
      </Heading>
      <CountryFlag size="small" code="es" name="Spain" />
    </Stack>
    <Stack direction="column">
      <Heading type="title3" as="h3">
        Medium
      </Heading>
      <CountryFlag code="es" name="Spain" />
    </Stack>
  </Stack>
)

info.title: Sizes
info.description: Country flags can be small or medium (the default).
